unnormalised: Hey, Ayurveda treatments sound interesting! My grandmother swears by it. She always says a good shirodhara from Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala is the best stress reliever. Heard good things about Panchakarma too. Anyone tried it near Bangalore? Maybe before Diwali? I'm craving some biryani now, thanks to all this wellness talk! Hope it's effective and not too expensive (Rs. 5000 seems steep!).
